Row.Text: Each [ICON_CITIZEN] Citizen belongs to a distinct culture group, determined when they are born. When a culture group becomes dominant, it unlocks a unique building. This building is destroyed if the group that unlocked it loses their dominant status. This building produces +1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness if it is unlocked by the same culture as your civilization's.[NEWLINE]----------------------[NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]City Culture(s):[ENDCOLOR]{1_CultureList}[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Dominant City Culture(s):[ENDCOLOR] {2_DominantCultureList}[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]A [ICON_CITIZEN] Citizen's culture group is determined by

The sun rises on the year {1_Year} {2_Era} Since time immemorial the {3_Adjective} people have lived a nomadic life. After years of wandering, they are finally ready to settle down and found their first city.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]{4_Leader}, your people have vested absolute power in you, trusting that you can build a Civilization to stand the test of time!
